entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as having a mother with a shrieking portrait. His will is also mentioned to be leaving the house to someone.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange is mentioned as Sirius's cousin and potentially the owner of the house due to an enchantment.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned in conversation with Harry about the possibility of an enchantment on the house.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having a conversation with Dumbledore and reacting to the mention of Bellatrix Lestrange.

relationships.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as Sirius's cousin.
Dumbledore and Harry are mentioned to be having a conversation about the enchantment on the house.
